abstracts.cdata!:
The project would include: construction
            of two new airports (Riberalta and San Borja), major
            improvement of two others (Santa Ana and Tarija), provision
            of navaids, communications equipment at project airports and
            countrywide, provision of general and runway maintenance
            equipment, technical assistance and training and detail
            design of Cochabamba Airport.
